SA21n2934:444: idaṃ tat paramaṃ tattvaṃ prajñopāyamayaṃ śivam |
SA21n2934:445: idam evādvayaṃ jñānaṃ bodhicittam idaṃ param ||
SA21n2934:447: 78 uktaṃ cāryanāgārjunapādaiḥ- yaḥ pumān kṣaṇam apy ekaṃ bodhicittaṃ prabhāvayet |
SA21n2934:448: aśakyo gaṇituṃ tasya puṇyarāśir iyān iti ||
SA21n2934:452: 79 sarvam etad abhipretyāha- ete cittasya śuddhateti |
SA21n2934:454: 80 ata eva mahāsukharūpāyā vajradharabhūmer atraiva pra- tipādanāt pāramitānayād asya viśeṣaḥ |
SA21n2934:455: 81 nanv asāv advayajñānarūpaiva tat ko'sya viśeṣaḥ?
SA21n2934:457: yathā vas- tutaḥ śūnyataikarasānāṃ balavaiśāradyādīnāṃ śrāvakanaye pratipāditānām api śūnyatāyā apratipādanāt,
SA21n2934:458: pāramitānaye ca pratipādanān mahān viśeṣo gīyate |
SA21n2934:459: 83 nanu ca prathamadhyānalābhino'pi cakravartina iva sukham upadiśyate,
SA21n2934:461: tathāhi pramododrekād eva prathamā bhūmiḥ pramuditocyate |
SA21n2934:466: na hi sūcichidraṃ chidram ity evākāśenāpi sāmyam anubhavati |
SA21n2934:468: yac cānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhisukham iti? 86 uktam etat |
SA21n2934:471: tasmāt tad apy anenaiva krameṇa boddhavyam |
SA21n2934:472: 87 tat kiṃ pāramitānaye na bodhiḥ? 88 naivam |
SA21n2934:473: prajñāpāramitayā vinā kuto'nuttarāyāḥ samyak- sambodher gandho'pi |
SA21n2934:474: paraṃ paryante'py avaśyam etam upāyam apekṣata ity ucyata ity alam ativistareṇa |
SA21n2934:476: 89 mahāsukhasādhanatvena pradhānaṃ sparśaviṣayaṃ tadindriyaṃ tajjñānaṃ ca karuṇādirūpaṃ pañcaprajñārūpaṃ ca pratipādayitum āha- ata ityādi |
SA21n2934:477: 90 bāhyaprajñāyāḥ kāyasya viṣayasya tadyogād ādhyātmi- kakāyajñānayoś ca śodhanād yad bhavati tad vakṣyāmi dṛṣṭi- yuktam iti |
SA21n2934:486: vinā tu mahāmudrāyogaṃ badhyate jagad ity āha - darśanād ityādi |
SA21n2934:491: śūnyatayā vinā karuṇādayo'pi na muktihetava iti bhāvaḥ |
SA21n2934:494: 95 evam abhyāsaparasya yathāmilitāhārasaṃskāram āha- yad ityādi |
SA21n2934:496: 96 na kevalaṃ tad ratikrīḍādikaṃ ca mahāmudrāpi mahāmudrārūpaṃ draṣṭavyam,
SA21n2934:505: 99 nanv āsāṃ paramā pūjā kamanam eva, sa ca doṣaḥ |
SA21n2934:515: tatra tattvarūpātmasamāropasya mātrādisamāropavat pāraṃparyeṇa bodhisādhanatvād adoṣaḥ |
SA21n2934:516: 102 nanu keṣāṃcid anubhavasyāpi niṣiddhatvād virodhaḥ syāt |
SA21n2934:525: (36) 103 mahāmudrādvayayogayuktaś ca yogī sakalam alobhādyāt- makaṃ jagad avalokayati |
SA21n2934:526: tato'sau sarveryāpathasaṃyuto'py akuśalānupalambharūpatvāt kuśalātmaivety āha- sa yogītyādi |
SA21n2934:529: tasmāt prajñopāyasvabhāvādvayabodhicittabhāva- naiva sarvapāpaviśodhanī sarvaśreyaskarī ca |
SA21n2934:530: 105 tad uktam āryanāgārjunapādaiḥ- mahāyānam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bodhicittam idaṃ param |
SA21n2934:535: 106 evaṃ ca vijñātavyam- ayaṃ sa paramo yogas tasmād vandyas tathāgataiḥ |
SA21n2934:539: śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ karma yad anyad api mantrajam |
SA21n2934:543: yac ca nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ caturdhā bhūmayo daśa |
SA21n2934:544: phalāvasthā ca sarvaṃ tad yogād asmāt samut- thitam ||
SA21n2934:545: bhūtā ye ca bhaviṣyanti bhavanti jinasūnavaḥ |
SA21n2934:546: lokeśādyā mahāsattvās te'py atraiva vyavasthi- tāḥ ||
SA21n2934:547: atītānāgatā buddhā vartamānā matāś ca ye |
SA21n2934:550: tāvantaḥ sarva etasmād yogād eva vinirgatāḥ ||
SA21n2934:552: yāvantaḥ sthiracalā bhāvās tāvantas tad- apāśrayāḥ ||
SA21n2934:554: 107 pañcakāmān vinā nīrasaiva śūnyatā syād ity āha- yāvetyādi |
SA21n2934:555: yāvan na viṣayarasaiḥ paripālyate bodhicittāṅkuras tāvan na buddhakāyakalpataruḥ prādurbhavati,
SA21n2934:557: 108 tad uktaṃ sarahapādaiḥ- tanutaracittāṅkurako viṣayarasair yadi na sicy- ate śuddhaiḥ |
SA21n2934:559: (39) iti paṇḍitābhayākaraguptakṛtāyām abhayapaddhatyāṃ śrībuddhakāpalamahātantraṭīkāyāṃ trayodaśaḥ paṭalaḥ ||
SA21n2934:560: (40) 14 jāpamudrādhyeṣaṇāsarvatantranidānapaṭala 1 abhimataniruttarārthadeśanayā saṃjātaprasādātiśayā yathā stuvanti tad darśayitum āha- athetyādi |
SA21n2934:579: 15 ekaruteneti na tu prathamaṃ durbodham abhidhāya va- canāntaraiḥ prakaṭitā |
SA21n2934:588: yatas teṣāṃ hetuphalātmako ji- navarair vineyeṣu gopitaḥ sudurlabho'rthaḥ sugūḍhago- care'smiṃs tantre mayā prakaṭīkṛtaḥ |
SA21n2934:591: ato manmukhena tair eva kṛtā deśaneyam iti bhāvaḥ |
SA21n2934:592: 23 mayi ca viparītadeśanāparādhādhyāropād akṣamā na kartavyety āha- kṣamaṃtu,
SA21n2934:594: 24 sarvatantram uktvābhiṣiktānām evātrādhikāra iti darśayituṃ paryante'bhiṣekavidhim āha-athetyādi |
SA21n2934:601: 29 kim evam prajñātoṣaṇe yatna ity āha- sarvabuddhaiḥ pūjitā |
SA21n2934:602: hetuphalāvasthayoḥ karmamudrāyogenaiva hi mahāmudrāsiddhir ity āmnāyaḥ |
SA21n2934:603: 30 katham evam ity āha- atraiva prajñāyāṃ sthitā buddhādayaḥ |
SA21n2934:607: 31 ata eva prajñājñānasya svarūpaṃ pratipādayati- (43) indītyādi |
SA21n2934:612: 34 sarvam idam asvabhāvaṃ yatra nopalabhyate sā paramā- nandagatiḥ |
SA21n2934:615: 35 tad uktaṃ dvikalpatantre- paramānande tu saṃprāpte nānātvavarjite kṣaṇe |
SA21n2934:619: 37 paramānandam eva hetutvena namasyati- tasmā ityādi |
SA21n2934:623: yaś cābhyāsān nirvedhabhāgīyā- dyadhigamakrameṇābhinandā samantato'bhijñābala- vaiśāradyādibhir atiśayaguṇaratnaiḥ samṛddhā jinānāṃ nikhilakleśakalaṅkāpagamāt sundarī samantabhadrā paramaprītivasatir mūrtiś caturthaḥ kāyo vajradharaḥ,
SA21n2934:624: paṇḍitānāṃ samyaksambuddhānāṃ hṛdi tādātmyena saka- lavikalpavikṣepapratikṣepān nibhṛtaṃ ko'py avāgbuddhigo- caraḥ- ata evainam adhigamya citrasenādīnāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāve- na vyavasthānaṃ vakṣyati- eko'dvayaḥ paramānandaḥ sar- vāvaraṇavāsanāvaśeṣanidrāvirahāj jāgarti,
SA21n2934:626: 40 tad anena ślokena tad eva prajñājñānaṃ rūpaviśeṣeṇa jalam iva taraṅgarūpeṇotpannaṃ caturtho'bhiṣeka ity uktam |
SA21n2934:627: sa punar ayaṃ mahāsukhamayo vajradharaḥ sarvatantranidā- nam |
SA21n2934:628: iti paṇḍitābhayākaraguptakṛtāyām abhayapaddhatyāṃ śrībuddhakapālamahātantraṭīkāyāṃ caturdaśaḥ paṭalaḥ samāptaḥ |
SA21n2934:629: (45) śrīmaddherukavīravartmavivṛter uccairud- añcacchubhāc chittvā saṃsṛtinirvṛtibhramam asau tan- maṇḍale mīlatu |
SA21n2934:630: loko'haṃ tu muner amuṣya bibhṛyāṃ mūrtīr anantāḥ prati- prāṇiprahvam adabhraśarma vidadhad dhvas- taprapañcaṃ ciram || 1 ||
SA21n2934:639: prajñāśrīr yadvihāryām iyam akṛ- takṛtārthārthisatkalpavallyām asyāś cāsmākavṛttyāstv asamaśubhasudhāpū- rapātheyatṛptiḥ || 4 ||
SA21n2934:641: sapādaṣoḍaśaślokaśatī saṃpiṇḍitā pramā paṇḍitair maṇḍanāyāsyāḥ prameva hṛdi vāstavī || || (47)
